file_content.text: Telemetry is received. All droids report your battle performance. Satisfactory.
In that case, I wish to take the hilt of the first blade from here.
Perhaps one day my performance could reach "very satisfactory."
My battle skills are more than merely "satisfactory."
Take the hilt. Treat with respect. Fight with honor.
[Inside is a stone urn, and the hilt of a weapon. Its design is archaic.]
[The hilt appears to have been modified, and heavily engraved as if to store information. You see no way to access it.]
Master Yuon, I've found the hilt of the first blade. A proto-lightsaber from someone called the "Weapon Master." The hilt looks as if there's data engraved on it.
Of course. "The first blade points the way"--Rajivari made the legendary weapon itself our guide. The Force is certainly with you, Padawan.
Please, bring the hilt back to the temple at once. I will look into a way to access that data.
Training droids. Find them. Prevail. I will know.
